Introduction

Junghwan is a Korean singer under YG Entertainment. He is the maknae and a vocalist in the boy group TREASURE.

In 2018, So Jung Hwan participated in YG Entertainment's new survival show, YG Treasure Box. On the final episode, he was announced as the third member of the boy group, later called TREASURE.

Junghwan debuted as the maknae of TREASURE on August 7, 2020 with the single album, The First Step: Chapter One.

On June 12, 2023, Junghwan was confirmed as the first member of TREASURE's sub-unit T5.
